metadata.title: Filbert - KSeF Invoice Management
metadata.description: Application for managing invoices in the KSeF system

hero.title: Manage KSeF invoices
hero.description: Filbert is an application for managing invoices in the Polish National e-Invoice System. Browse sales and purchase invoices, control VAT and export data.

salesInvoices.description: Browse issued invoices with automatic amount summaries

purchaseInvoices.description: Control costs and VAT charged by suppliers

multipleCompanies.description: Manage invoices of multiple companies from one account
